row.Docu:
About Brocade ================================ Brocade G610 and G620 Switches are designed to meet the demands of hyper-scale virtualization, large cloud infrastructures, and growing flash-based storage environments by delivering market-leading Gen 6 Fibre Channel technology.
About Automic's Brocade Package ================================ Automate the usage of Brocade switch through various actions. These actions are basic building blocks to achieve a specific business goal.
=Limitations= * No known limitations.
=Actions= Following actions are supported for Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_PORT_STATE * Action Description: This action check current state of the given fibre channel port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.ENABLE_PORT * Action Description: This action enables Given Fibre Channel port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.FIBRE_DISABLE_PORT * Action Description: This action disable given Fiber channel port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_LOGICAL_SWITCHES * Action Description: This action is to get details of Logical Switches on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.ADD_PORT_TO_LOGICAL_SWITCH * Action Description: This action is to add Port to Logical Switch on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_LOGICAL_SWITCH * Action Description: This action is to Create Logical Switch on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_LOGICAL_SWITCH * Action Description: This action is to Delete Logical Switch on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.REMOVE_PORT_FROM_LOGICAL_SWITCH * Action Description: This action is to Remove Port from Logical Switch on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_PORT_ATTRIBUTE * Action Description: This Action will be used to examine any attribute of the given fibre channel port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.SET_PORT_ATTRIBUTE * Action Description: This Action will set port attribute so that it can define value of the any port attribute on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.LIST_FIBRE_CHANNEL_RESOURCES * Action Description: This Action will List Fibre Channel Resources on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_FABRIC_SWITCH_DETAILS * Action Description: This Action will Get Fabric Switch Details on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_FIBRE_CHANNEL_SWITCH * Action Description: This Action will Get Fibre Channel Switch details on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_ACCESS_GATEWAY_MODE * Action Description: This action fetch access gateway value of given switch channel interface on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_PORT_GROUPS * Action Description: This action is to get details of Access Gateway Port Groups on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.EDIT_PORT_GROUP * Action Description: This action is to Edit Port Group to change Port Group properties.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.ADD_PORT_TO_PORT_GROUP * Action Description: This action is to add N_Ports and F_Ports to the Port Group.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.ADD_PORT_MAPPING * Action Description: This action is to add Port to mapping.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_PORT_MAPPING * Action Description: This action is to remove given F_Port to N_Port mappings.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.REMOVE_PORT_FROM_PORT_GROUP * Action Description: This action is to remove ports from Port Group.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_PORT_GROUP * Action Description: This action is to delete Port Group.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_N_PORTS_AND_F_PORTS * Action Description: This action fetch n_ports and f_ports on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_PORT_GROUP * Action Description: This action is to create Port Group.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.EDIT_N_PORT * Action Description: This action is to update any properties of the N_Port.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.START_DIAGNOSTIC_PORT_TESTING * Action Description: This Action will Start Diagnostic Port Testing.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.STOP_DIAGNOSTIC_PORT_TESTING * Action Description: This action is to stop the diagnostic port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_DIAGNOSTIC_PORT_TEST_STATUS * Action Description: This action is to get details of Diagnostic Port on Brocade.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_BROCADE.PUB.ACTION.GET_DIAGNOSTIC_PORT_DETAILS * Action Description: This action is to get details of Diagnostic Port Details on Brocade.
